Player History
Traded from Bay City to Boston (UBA) on 1/31/1979 (Going to PIL: P E. Regalado, 1B J. Dugas. Going to BC: P T. Fierros, RF M. Fagenson)...

Traded from Boston (UBA) to Coney Island on 3/2/1982 (Going to CI: 1B J. Dugas. Going to PIL: 2B C. Myer)...
Hit for the cycle against Pontiac on 4/10/1983...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1983, hitting .444 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
